message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its benefits to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share this product. Considering my budget and the value I seek, I would like to propose a price of $8,800 for the product.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $9,100?
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $8,900 for the product.
